title: No Bull? Bitcoiners Pay Tribute to ‘Apex Predator of Money’ With Shark Satutue
contentSnippet: The artwork also pays homage to Damien Hirst.

title: Spark marks first major rotation from US Treasurys into regulated DeFi
contentSnippet: As Treasury yields sink, Spark’s $100 million move into Superstate’s regulated crypto carry fund signals DeFi’s pivot toward uncorrelated yield sources.

title: Myriad Moves: Does Bitcoin Bounce Before 'Uptober' Ends, and Who Wins the World Series?
contentSnippet: Top markets on Myriad this week include price predictions on Bitcoin and Ethereum, as well as chances the Dodgers win the World Series.

title: Swiss Crypto Bank AMINA Taps Tokeny to Build Compliant 'Bridge' for Asset Tokenization
contentSnippet: The partnership combines AMINA Bank’s Swiss-regulated custody with Tokeny’s blockchain infrastructure to ease tokenisation for financial institutions.

title: Ethereum triple bottom setup hints at a $4K breakout next
contentSnippet: Ether's mega whales are quietly buying the dips, absorbing supply from smaller holders during the price drop.

title: Revolut Secures MiCA License in Cyprus—Is a Stablecoin Next?
contentSnippet: An EU lawyer said the European banking giant is now ‘positioned to legally issue its own stablecoin,’ with a 2026 launch ‘plausible.’

title: Stellar Edges Lower 0.4% to $0.3123 as Partnership News Surfaces
contentSnippet: Double-top reversal at $0.3147 resistance overshadows collaborative payment infrastructure developments.

title: Ledger and Trezor 2025 hardware wallets released: What’s new for users?
contentSnippet: Cointelegraph takes a look at the latest devices from Ledger and Trezor, two long-time leaders in self-custody hardware wallets.

title: Binance's CZ Wins Pardon From U.S. President Donald Trump
contentSnippet: U.S. President Donald Trump pardoned Binance founder Changpeng Zhao months after he said he'd asked for a pardon.

title: Trump Pardons Binance Founder Changpeng Zhao After Biden's 'War on Crypto'
contentSnippet: U.S. President Donald Trump has pardoned Binance founder Changpeng "CZ" Zhao, the White House confirmed to Decrypt.

title: Binance confirms CZ received presidential pardon from Trump
contentSnippet: US President Donald Trump signed a pardon for the Binance founder on Wednesday, The Wall Street Journal reported, clearing the way for his possible return to the exchange.

title: The MegaETH interview (w/ Bread)
contentSnippet: Crypto bounces as BTC dominance rises to 60%. The SEC and CFTC aim for crypto regulation by the end of 2025. Democrats and crypto executives meet to discuss a crypto bill. Over 150 crypto ETF filings

title: HBAR Dips 1.4% to $0.1675 Breaking Below Key Support Zone
contentSnippet: HBAR’s technical structure turned firmly bearish after repeated failures at the $0.1700 resistance zone, while a surge in volume confirmed a decisive support break.

title: Alt5 Sigma Suspends CEO Peter Tassiopoulos, Appoints Jonathan Hugh as Interim Leader
contentSnippet: No reason was given for the suspension of Tassiopoulos, who was appointed just over a year ago .

title: How Tari Lets You Mine Crypto in ‘Less Than a Minute’
contentSnippet: The proof-of-work layer-1 is designed to make crypto mining accessible to mainstream users, contributor Naveen Jain explained.

title: Crypto for Advisors: The Growth of Stablecoins
contentSnippet: Stablecoin adoption surges post-GENIUS Act. Discover how cost savings, liquidity, and regulatory clarity are driving their growth in global finance.

title: Fireblocks Acquires Dynamic to Expand On-Chain Developer Stack
contentSnippet: The deal unites Fireblocks’ institutional custody infrastructure with Dynamic’s consumer wallet and onboarding tech to create an end-to-end onchain platform, it said.

title: Bitcoin Options Open Interest Surges to Record $50B on Deribit as Traders Hedge Downside Risks
contentSnippet: A bearish bet that bitcoin will fall to $100,000 or less is becoming just as popular as bullish bets on higher prices.

title: Blockchain.com secures MiCA license, hires Malta insider to head EU expansion
contentSnippet: Blockchain.com praised Malta’s regulatory clarity while member states still argued over how MiCA should apply across the EU.

title: DeFi Specialist Aave Labs Acquires Stable Finance, Expands Consumer Access to Onchain Savings
contentSnippet: Acquisition brings Stable’s consumer app expertise to Aave Labs as it builds mainstream DeFi products.

title: Bitcoin whales add 40X leverage BTC shorts ahead of Trump announcement
contentSnippet: Bitcoin fielded fresh leveraged shorts on Thursday as whales appeared to bet on downside volatility around another announcement from US President Donald Trump.

title: Trezor Unveils 'Quantum-Ready' Safe 7 Hardware Wallet
contentSnippet: Trezor said its new Safe 7 device anticipates a post-quantum future even as crypto thefts are set to hit record highs.

title: Keyrock: Crypto’s Buyback Boom Tests the Industry’s Financial Maturity
contentSnippet: Tokenholder payouts have surged more than 400% since 2024, but Keyrock’s Amir Hajian warns that most are still funded by treasuries rather than real revenue, arguing that buybacks must evolve from hyp

title: These key support levels can help Bitcoin avoid a ‘bear flag’ crash to $88K
contentSnippet: Bitcoin traded 13% below its $126K all-time high as traders said the BTC price could drop to $88K over the next few days if key support levels don’t hold.

title: BNB wins ‘Uptober’ amid Binance market crash scrutiny
contentSnippet: BNB turned a sluggish October for Bitcoin into a breakout month, driven by memecoin trading, rising fees and Aster’s ascent despite renewed scrutiny on Binance.

title: Identity systems must work for the disconnected
contentSnippet: Digital identity systems exclude 2.7 billion people who don’t have smartphones. Offline attestations and peer-signed credentials must serve the disconnected.

title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
contentSnippet: Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

title: Solana Company Ramps Up Staking Push With Institutional Validators as Shares Tumble
contentSnippet: Even as its shares plunge, Solana Company says market volatility is a chance to prove conviction in its Solana-based treasury model.

title: Morning Minute: Crypto Caught in Middle of Democrat vs Republican Battle
contentSnippet: It's getting heated in DC, and the crypto industry is stuck in the middle—perhaps a sign of what's to come as it becomes more politicized.

title: Ledger's Latest Nano Crypto Hardware Wallet Offers a Punch of Personality
contentSnippet: The Ledger Nano Gen5 is totally redesigned and features exclusive badges from legendary Apple icon designer, Susan Kare.

title: 野村系レーザーデジタル、投資ファンドをSeiブロックチェーンでトークン化
contentSnippet: 野村傘下レーザーデジタルのファンドがセイ上でトークン化。カイオ経由でブラックロックやブレバン・ハワードなどグローバル大手と並ぶ機関投資家向けRWA商品として展開。

title: クオンタムソリューションズ、イーサリアム保有量で国内上場企業トップ
contentSnippet: 東京上場のクオンタムソリューションズが7日間で2365ETHを取得した。アーク・インベスト創業者ウッド氏も支持を表明。

title: ポリマーケット、米大手スポーツベッティングと提携　予測市場インフラ提供へ
contentSnippet: 予測市場大手ポリマーケットが米スポーツベッティング大手ドラフトキングスの清算機関に指定。競合カルシとの競争激化の中、B2C市場に加えB2B事業で新たな収益源を確保。NY証取の親会社から20億ドルの投資も受け事業拡大を加速。

title: アーサーヘイズのビットコイン100万ドル予想、高市政権の積極財政は市場の起爆剤になり得るか？
contentSnippet: BitMEX創業者アーサー・ヘイズ氏が、高市新政権の物価高対策によりビットコイン価格が100万ドル(約1.5億円)に達すると予測した。同氏は景気刺激策の推進が、日銀の量的緩和（QE）への転換につながると見ている。

title: ルミス米上院議員、仮想通貨アプリを後押しするオープンバンキング規則設立求める
contentSnippet: 米ルミス上院議員がCFPBにオープンバンキング規則の策定を要請した。銀行口座と仮想通貨取引所を接続するAPI活用で迅速な送金を目指す。大手銀行の反対姿勢も指摘した。

title: リミックスポイント、株式希薄化を伴わない仮想通貨購入方針を決議
contentSnippet: 株式会社リミックスポイントは10月23日、2026年6月まで株式発行による暗号資産購入を行わない方針を決議。今後は手元資金等を活用し、既存株主への希薄化を回避する。

title: ビットコインは弱含みで推移、米コインベースとロビンフッドにBNB上場へ
contentSnippet: ビットコインは10万8000ドル台で弱含みの推移。米大手取引所CoinbaseとRobinhoodが相次いでBNB上場を発表し、規制環境の変化を示す歴史的な動きとして注目を集めている。一方、トランプ関税ショックで巨額利益を上げた大口投資家が再び大規模なショートポジションを構築しており、市場は警戒感を強めている。

title: 米民主党議員ら、トランプ政権中東特使に仮想通貨開示要求　利益相反を指摘
contentSnippet: 米民主党議員らがウィトコフ中東特使に保有する仮想通貨などについて情報提供を求めた。トランプ一族のWLFI関連で利益相反の可能性を指摘している。

title: ハイパーリキッド・ストラテジーズ、最大約1500億円調達をSECに提出　HYPEトークン購入含む
contentSnippet: ナスダック上場のハイパーリキッド・ストラテジーズが最大10億ドル（約1,500億円）の資金調達を目指すS-1をSECに提出した。HYPEトークン購入を含む。7月設立後、早くも大規模増資計画。

title: 計2600億円相当のビットコイン、ハッキングされたLuBian関連のウォレットから移動
contentSnippet: 計2600億円超相当の仮想通貨ビットコインが、マイニングプールLuBianに関連するウォレットから移動。トランザクションは4つに分けられて別々のアドレスに送金されている。
